name: bryce Bartlett
text: We ordered a Buffalo Chicken pizza about two hours ago. They forgot the cream cheese and the sauce... I’m not sure how they forgot the sauce. But good for them, their dedication to not giving a care was extraordinary! The pizza was supposed …More

text: Stellar job making pizza, packed full of ingredients and cooked all the way through---  friendly accommodating staff !!! Deliciousness~

text: Placed an order said it was gonna take 30 minutes. Took 45. Received order they got it wrong they put cheese on a cheese is dairy free order. They did a remake. Received we make and it was wrong again and smaller size than what I ordered. …More

name: Amanda Varlese
text: We had the worst delivery experience. We received a text from the driver stating that they had delivered our order. Well, much to our disappointment, there was no food waiting for us. We waited a few minutes in case the driver just sent the …More

name: Chocolate Xing
text: Made a super spicy chicken wings, and don't wanna fix it. Bad attitudes on customer service. Never gonna order again.

name: Jack
text: I keep coming back here and they keep making great pizza!

name: Eric Gotzmer
text: They just can't get things done right,2nd time my order was messed up in1week sad state of affairs.Really get it together! You are definitely going to lose business if this keeps up.

name: daniel ramirez
text: Make sure you call in twice from the parking lot. I called to let them know I arrived for my carry out and they forgot I was outside for 30 minutes until I called again. But the time I got my pizza it was cold from just sitting out

name: Michaela C
text: Good food, but truly atrocious service! Every time I have ordered food, they have always forgotten part of our order! I constantly have to drive back to get the missing part of the order. I have given them 6 chances to get my order right, but I will not be back after tonight!

name: JP
text: Ordered using the online system and selected this store as my usual store was closed. After I placed the order, I get a message from the store that I have to place it with the wrong store and have to place it with the Erie store. I call …More

name: Andrew Pliagas
text: I've never once had a bad meal from this Blackjack Pizza location; their product beats the life out of any of the large delivery chains (Pizza Hut, Domino's, Papa John's) for quality and flavor. With that said, I've also never had a meal on …More

name: Spencer Watkins
text: Considering the hand scrawled message on the door about "no customers inside!" due to the Covid-19 fraud - no interest in eating their pizza.

name: J Kirby
text:
Atrocious service. In the three times we've ordered here in the last year, the food is always late, usually missing some part of the order.
Most recent adventure: Food finally delivered 40 minutes after the "on the way" …More

name: Arthur Bruffett
text: Love the pizza, calzones, just great!

name: Brian Abbott
text: Ordered from this location a handful of times. About two weeks ago, the pizza was delivered almost an hour later than what their automated online ordering email claimed, but it we ordered early enough in the afternoon to where it was no big …More

name: Daniel Sanchez Jr
text: The best blackjack pizzas ive ever been to. Salad was fresh to deaf and pizza was above normal blackjack pizza standards in my opinion anyway.

name: Jose Lopez
text: Good pizza friendly people to watch

name: Robert Johnson
text: My favorite 'chain' pizza since moving to Longmont from Chicago 20 years ago. The Good Deal really is; Pizza Hut is $5 more for the same.  They have a lot of toppings to build your own if none of their specialty pies strikes your fancy.

name: Pepper Warthan
text: Pizza was just okay, cheese bread wasn't even worth eating one piece of, it just didn't have any flavor.

name: Chance Benmackin
text: If I could give 0 stars I would. Just for an overall performance over the last month in general. I’ve ordered a few times and been disgusted opening the box, looks like the pizzas were just thrown around. Management is no longer helpful. …More

name: Emily Boyich
text:
GUYS. This pizza and the service is AWESOME. Coming from Chicago, I struggle to find good pie out here but MAN i was pleasantly surprised!
Get the pan pizza with all the meats!
You’re welcome!!

name: Ken Cox
text: Rude manager, ruined my evening. Won't be coming back.

name: charla wenger
text: Best pizza in town by far. Super good pricing too.

name: Carolyn Beagle
text: Great pizza

name: Larry Levin
text: Worst experience ever...cold pizza, forgot the salad dressing, forgot the extra cheese for the salad, still got charged, of course. Woman answering the phone hung up on me when I asked for a credit for a free pizza, called back, manager …More

name: G. Kunkel
text: Best place to just walk in and order a pizza and get it at a great price.  Just your basic tasty Pizza.

name: Anne Palazzola
text: They delivered the wrong order (we had an email confirmation of what we asked for) and refused to fix it.  My 5 year old was in complete meltdown mode after the pizza we ordered wasn't something he could eat. …More

name: Olivia Stork
text: Would never come here again. They need new staff. Horrible place

name: Linda Hansen
text: We ordered a pizza at 7 pm and were told 30-35 minutes for divery. The driver called 3 times over a half hour past the time he should have been here! Use GPS!! We cancelled the order rather than eat cold pizza..an hour and a half after we ordered. Thank God for Dominoes!

name: Daniel Dahlman
text: They delivered in heavy snow.  And the pizza really is the best in the area. The staff are also incredible!

name: M Lenz
text: BEST PIZZA EVVVVAAAAA

name: Josh Peterson
text: My first time visiting blackjack pizza , the have the best pizza and calzones , i recomend this place 100% guys

name: Lezly Harrison
text: A very respectable pizza pie. The carry-out special is a fab deal!

name: Michele Schenk
text: UPDATE: I was able to speak with somebody else on Saturday and he was VERY helpful. I also learned that I provided a wrong number in my phone number in the online order, so that is why they couldn't reach me. My only complaint at this point …More

name: Brady Ferron
text: They consistently mess up orders, wrong toppings, missing ranch dressing, etc. Two weeks ago we had friends in town and made a big order. Order was screwed up more than usual. The deep dishes were rounds and ranch dressings were missing, …More

name: William Zajac
text: Wouldn't accept the coupon they provided me for free bread just two days earlier, and the pizza was literally the worst I have ever had. To quote my wife, "how did they get even the crust to taste like water?" …More

name: Sam Griego
text: I made an order on their online platform and waited 45 minutes (delivery time was quoted at 35 minutes) and ended up having them cancel the order because when I called they said their online ordering "doesn't update" and now they are 1 hour …More

name: Nicole Stutte
text: We’ve ordered twice from Blackjack in the last month and both times were awful!  The first time they lost our order and made it once we arrived for pick up.  Tonight we ordered delivery.  Our pizza and cheese bread were delivered 35 minutes …More

name: Becky Clark
text: Wow! Amazing pizza, fast and friendly service.  My favorite go-to for anytime I’m looking to order out. Carry out  is always hot and super fast!!!

name: Chad wood
text: Best pizza ever

name: Marc Reasoner
text: Best local pizza chain in Denver! The Mediterranean Salad, sans onions, was outstanding!

name: David Delavirgen
text: On Friday March 9th at 10:14pm I called and placed a carry out order for AFTER 10pm and was able to utilize Carry out services that evening. I had a wonderful experience that evening. …More

name: Jana
text: Yet another great pizza. Thank you

name: Contessa Crees
text: Pizza delivery arrived at my hotel quickly was hot & yummy. Very happy traveler!

name: Justin Guerra
text: I called up last night 40 minutes before closing and asked if they were still delivering and promptly got hung up on. Thinking the call might have been dropped I tried again...they started to screen my calls. …More

name: Laura Brewer
text: We ordered 3 pizzas for our party. One hour later the pizza was still not delivered. We called and the girl on the phone assured us it would arrive soon. One hour later (2 hours after calling) we called again. They said they tried to call …More

name: SpellbindingAcrylics / Etsy
text: We like Blackjack the best out of the other pizza joints. Lately I've been trying to eat healthier so I have a salad instead. The Mediterranean salad is so good and comes in a huge bowl. My husband gets a chicken jalapeño bbq pizza, that has a generous amount of toppings.

name: Leah Leverich
text: Cold. Expensive. Hair and burnt stuff on pizzas. And cold!!! For lots of $

name: Chrono Cook
text: I usually like Blackjack but tonight i got a pizza delivered that tasted like burned oil.  This is the really bitter burned oil taste that sticks to your mouth, ugh it's still there.  Anyway mistakes will happen but when i called to let …More

name: Matt Robinson
text: Cool new voice ordering app - makes mobile ordering way easier than similar products that don't have voice.  Nice to not have to learn how to make the app work, but just speak my order instead.

name: CH P
text: Square Pan  is Not bad. Otherwise this place is only two stars.

name: Joshua Clifford
text: I'm not sure what some these other reviews are talking about, but I've had nothing but great experiences at Blackjack. Friendly service, fast orders, and great prices.

name: Brian Olsen
text: I like the thin crust and I do like my pizza well done which is what this was

name: B Spice
text: Very rude and unprofessional. Driver couldnt find my address and they denied service after a hour of waiting to have them redeliver my pizza.  They need a new manager thats more professional. Amanda is rude

name: Sam Heller
text: Speedy service and consistently delicious pizza. Reasonable prices too.

name: FOOL 4184
text: Ordered a gluten free dairy free pizza on super bowl Sunday for delivery. I had to have my particular pizza delivered 3 times. The first time they covered it in cheese. I called them and the man was rude and said I didn't ask for no …More

name: Angie Romero
text: Rude people especially the brunette with glasses. Order from their she was so rude to me when I asked for another item. They lost my business. I always have order from them but the last few times they messed up my order then when you call they are so rude about it...

name: Justin Bruce
text: Excellent pizza delivered in a timely manner. Driver was very courteous too.

name: x j
text: Got a loaded salad that was more of a mini half loaded salad, call managers on is rude, get new salad and taste like soap. Spend about 60 a week here not any more. Will no longer order from here I expect this from pizza hut but not this place.

name: Jeff P
text: Messed up our order.  Refused to fix it.  Had email to prove they were wrong and they told me to pound sand.  Lost a customer.

text: Tasty pizza. Super fast delivery and great deals.

name: Jonathan Kaltenbaugh
text: Closed more than 30 minutes before their posted hours.

name: Diana Slough
text: The past 2 deliveries have been past the ETA. When the drivers arrived; they both said: I rang the bell 3-7 times, I called you 4 times.........Not True! Really don't know what has hapoened;  but I will not  order again.

text: My go to pizza place!

text: Cant beat their small personal pizza. 2 items for $3.51 after tax, cant get lunch for that price anywhere else.

name: Timothy McTearnen
text: I called for a pizza delivery, we live less Than a mile away. I called 3 times wondering where my order was, and  an hour and fifteen minutes later the driver showed up!! The pie was cold, and with  a 5 dollar tip, this mess cost me 28 dollars!!! Never will buy here again!!!  Warning!!!
